fields.label: hero video
fields.name: hero_video
fields.instructions: This video will be the background for the hero section. You can use this instead of 'hero bg' if you want to set a video instead of an image.

fields.label: hero bg
fields.name: hero_bg
fields.instructions: This image will be the background for the hero section. You can use this instead of 'hero video' if you want to set a image instead of an video.

fields.label: hero logo
fields.name: hero_logo
fields.instructions: This image will appear over the bottom left of the hero section. It can be stacked above 'hero text'.

fields.label: hero text
fields.name: hero_text
fields.instructions: This image will appear over the bottom left of the hero section. It can be stacked below 'hero logo'.

fields.label: hero credit
fields.name: hero_credit
fields.instructions: This text will appear over the bottom right of the hero section.

fields.label: menu order
fields.name: menu_order
fields.instructions: Product data is pulled from Inriver and must be edited there. Product data will be updated daily via cron. For all other fields go to products->categories and find the category you want to edit.

sub_fields.label: slug
sub_fields.name: slug
sub_fields.instructions:
Must be lowercase. Letters only. Hyphenated. No spaces. Must match slug found on the tab custom field.
ex: sales-team, service-centers.

fields.label: Tabs
fields.name: tabs
fields.instructions:
Match with tab slug above.
ex: sales-team, service-centers.

sub_fields.label: slug
sub_fields.name: slug
sub_fields.instructions: Must match slug specified in the Tab Buttons custom field.

sub_fields.label: card content
sub_fields.name: card_content
sub_fields.instructions: Use class open-agent-contact-modal on button to open the contact modal. Set form content below.

sub_fields.label: Anchor
sub_fields.name: anchor
sub_fields.instructions: Anchors generated in map are the team member's full name, lowercase, hyphen (-) instead of space ( ). EX: john-doe

sub_fields.label: image
sub_fields.name: image
sub_fields.instructions: only images with a max-width of 504px and a max-height of 294px.

fields.label: featured
fields.name: featured
fields.instructions:
Will display: 
content, image, content part 2 (on mobile). 
content, content part 2, image (on desktop).
